content: {"name": "South Oakland Food Depot - SVDP Detroit", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Located inside the St. Vincent de Paul Detroit\u2019s Madison Heights store.", "email": "", "url": "https://svdpdetroit.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "28720 Stephenson Highway", "address_2": null, "city": "Madison Heights", "state_province": "MI", "postal_code": "48071", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.50352699999999, "longitude": -83.1168458}, "phones": [{"number": "(313) 393-2930", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}]}
